synopsis.text: Removing the chaos of the recent battle against Kagato, life seems to return to its usual rhythm. However, for Tenchi Masaki, peace remains elusive as two women, Aeka and Ryouko, vie for his affection. In a desperate attempt to win Tenchi's heart, both women resort to unconventional methods. Inspired by shoujo manga discovered by Ryouko, they decide to emulate the romantic strategies depicted in the comic books. As Aeka and Ryouko subject Tenchi to a series of orchestrated romantic scenarios, the question remains: will their efforts bear fruit, or will they be left with nothing but awkward encounters?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
